author: timesunion.com
title: Summaries
text:

Image 1 of 1 Schuylerville quarterback William Griffen rolls out to pass during Friday's Class B varsity football matchup versus Glens Falls at Schuylerville High School Oct. 9, 2015. (Ed Burke / Special to the Times Union)
